comment: Yeh, synopharm was the first available vaccine here, so I took it as soon as I could. Pfizer wasnt readily available here until March/April
amr:
# ::snt Yeh, synopharm was the first available vaccine here, so I took it as soon as I could. Pfizer wasnt readily available here until March/April
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (v / vaccine
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 1)
            :ARG2-of (a / available-02)
            :location (h / here)
            :domain (p / product
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Synopharm"))
            :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (t / take-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                        :time (s / soon
                              :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 t
                                    :ARG3 (e / equal)
                                    :ARG4 (p2 / possible-01
                                          :ARG1 t))))))
      :snt2 (a2 / available-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG2 (p3 / product
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Pfizer"))
            :location (h3 / here)
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (s2 / slash
                        :op1 (d / date-entity
                              :month 3)
                        :op2 (d2 / date-entity
                              :month 4)))
            :manner (r / ready))
      :mod (y / yeh
            :mode expressive))

comment: Have friends who've gotten sinopharm, too. But Pfizer appears to work better against the Delta variant.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (g / get-01
                        :ARG1 (s / sinopharm)
                        :mod (t / too))
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG2 (f / friend))))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a / appear-02
                  :ARG1 (w / work-09
                        :ARG0 (c2 / company
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Pfizer"))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / against
                              :op1 (v / variant
                                    :mod c2
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Delta"))))
                  :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (g2 / good-02
                              :ARG1 w)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / more)))))
